responsive.text: Emily spent three hours with me and my cluttered wardrobe. I hadn't updated my look since before having my daughter, and Emily helped me with shapes so I now have a much better idea of what looks good on me. I took three sacks of clothes to the charity shop afterwards! Friends have noticed the difference; it is easier choosing what to wear each day, and I feel more confident.

I was at a low ebb as a significant birthday approached and feeling out of shape I covered myself up with shapeless black clothes. Emily gently steered me towards more flattering colours and cuts and although I was anxious at first I've now got lots of outfits I know make me look younger and slimmer!

Since having my 'colours done', with Emily I avoid black and try to invest in those shades which flatter and enhance. I've noticed I get more compliments and was even asked by one friend if I'd had work done!
Emily has picked out some great options for what I'm trying to achieve with my look. She has a great eye.
A styling session with Emily is fun and saves you money because you will never make any more fashion mistakes. I now know that everything in my wardrobe suits me
Emily has the amazing ability to put together the perfect outfit for my body type and make me look fantastic. I trust hercompletely to always find the best colours and styles for me
Thank you so much,I loved it! You've given me the confidence to wear all sorts of things again and it was such fun - you're a real start turn.
